A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.ScrabbleListener
Quits, or calls the newGame or makeMove methods according to what ActionEvent triggered this method.
addDown(int, int, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.SBoard
Iteratively places a given word's tiles on the board, from top to bottom.
addRight(int, int, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.SBoard
Iteratively places a given word's tiles on the board, from left to right.
addWord(String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Adds input word to Scrabble's HashSet of legal words.

C

calculateScore(String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Calculate score for input word and adds to temporary score object.
checkTile(int, int, String, int) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if new words formed are contiguous with existing tiles, by calling checkTileDown() or checkTileRight() methods according to input direction.
checkTileDown(int, int, int) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if new words formed vertically are contiguous with existing tiles.
checkTileRight(int, int, int) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if new words formed horizontally are contiguous with existing tiles.
cs321.superscrabble - package cs321.superscrabble
 
currentScore() - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble

draw() - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.SPieces
Returns new tile if there are any remaining; otherwise throws IllegalMove (Empty Bag) exception.

F

findPieces(int, int, String, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if tiles used already exist on the board, or are already racked, by calling findPiecesDown() or findPiecesRight() methods according to input direction.
findPiecesDown(int, int, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if tiles used vertically already exist on the board, or are already racked.
findPiecesRight(int, int, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if tiles used horizontally already exist on the board, or are already racked.

P

Display method, draws tiles, lines, row and column labels.
parse(String, String, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Translates input square string to numerical horizontal and vertical board positions, sends resulting values along with direction and word to Process() method.
process(int, int, String, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Sends input y, x, direction, and word values to various methods implementing Scrabble rule checks (checkTile(), findPieces(), validNewWords()).

R

reset() - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Reinitializes temporary board, tile bag, rack, score, and array of used positions to last saved values.

T

takeTurn(String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Takes input string, breaks it up into 3 tokens (square, direction, and word) for processing by Parse() method, and calls for update of GUI components.

update(int, int, String, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.SBoard
Updates board; depending on direction input, calls on either addDown or addRight method to actually place word's tiles on board.

V

validNewWords(String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if new words formed on board are legal, by calling validNewWordsDown() or validNewWordsRight() methods according to input direction.
validNewWordsDown(int, int, int, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if new words formed vertically on board are legal.
validNewWordsRight(int, int, int, String) - Method in class cs321.superscrabble.Scrabble
Checks to see if new words formed horizontally on board are legal.
